it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.observer

Class RemoteRoutingObservable<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.observer.RemoteRoutingObservable<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of events dispatched by this class
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModelImpl

    public abstract class RemoteRoutingObservable<T>
extends Object
    Observable class where observers subscribe with a username. The observers can also communicate through the network, so calling RemoteObserver.update(Object) on them may cause an IOException.

    This class handles the case where the dispatched events/updates must be sent to only a subset of the observers. Each observer can subscribe with a username, when an event needs to be dispatched it is routed based on a provided list of recipients.

    This abstract class provides two methods to notify observers: one sends the event to only given observers and the other one sends them to all observers, regardless of the username they subscribed with

    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini, Tiziano Fucci
    See Also:
    for a version of this without routing, RemoteObserver

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addObserver(String username, RemoteObserver<T> observer)
      Subscribe given observer to all events addressed to the specified username.
      void notifyObservers(Collection<String> recipients, T event)
      Sends the event to the observers of the recipients (i.e. calls Observer.update(Object) on them).
      void notifyObservers(String username, T event)
      Sends the event to the observers of the username (i.e. calls Observer.update(Object) on them).
      void notifyObservers(T event)
      Sends the event to all the observers, regardless of the usernames they subscribed to.

      Unsubscribe all observers for a specific username.

    • Method Detail

      • addObserver

        public void addObserver(String username,
                        RemoteObserver<T> observer)
        Subscribe given observer to all events addressed to the specified username.
        Parameters:
        username - username for routing
        observer - observer to be subscribed

      • removeObserver

        public void removeObserver(String username,
                           RemoteObserver observer)
        Unsubscribe given observer from events addressed to given username. If the given pair does not exist, nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        username - username for routing
        observer - observer to be unsubscribed

      • removeAllObservers

        public void removeAllObservers(String username)
        Unsubscribe all observers for a specific username. If an observer is subscribed to different usernames, it will be kept on the other usernames. If the username does not exist, nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        username - username whose observers must be removed

      • notifyObservers

        public void notifyObservers(String username,
                            T event)
        Sends the event to the observers of the username (i.e. calls Observer.update(Object) on them).
        Parameters:
        username - username for routing
        event - event to be sent

      • notifyObservers

        public void notifyObservers(Collection<String> recipients,
                            T event)
        Sends the event to the observers of the recipients (i.e. calls Observer.update(Object) on them). If an observers is subscribed to more than one username, it will only be notified once.
        Parameters:
        recipients - collection of usernames whose observers will received the event
        event - event to be sent

      • notifyObservers

        public void notifyObservers(T event)
        Sends the event to all the observers, regardless of the usernames they subscribed to. If an observers is subscribed to more than one username, it will only be notified once.
        Parameters:
        event - event to be sent
